markdownRemark.html:
🍜🍚 Technology Specialist ● Implemented live-stream fundraising technology for Project Restore Us to raise $54,000 in one month to feed essential worker families through the redistribution of existing commercial food supply chains. Streamlined data storage by implementing Salesforce for Non-profits. Helped build online presence with SEO, streamlined data-collection processes and designed first logo and branding.

Click here to read the Givebutter Success Story.
